package.name: bluerov_regular
package.description: The 3D regular bluerov vehicle description (6 thrusters configuration). The original 3D model was obtained at https://github.com/FletcherFT/bluerov2/tree/master/bluerov2_description which is under the Apache-2.0 License. If you wan to use this model in your work, please refer to the original source.
package.author: Frederico Costa Vaz
